column4: why is  my GRUB not working? i got grub error 21 after taking out a hard drive from my comp, then tried to fix it, and now i get grub error 17
did you check what those errors mean?

well, im not to experienced with stuff like that, I was just making sure you didnt just try random stuff :D
yeah, i just can't seem to fix it. it's alright
